hello all: anybody know how to format harddisk in ubuntu 9.04?
mkfs is the linux format command.
yes, followed by the partition that you wish to format.
gemilang@gemilang-desktop:~$ sudo mkfs [sudo] password for gemilang: Usage: mkfs [-V] [-t fstype] [fs-options] device [size]gemilang@gemilang-desktop:~$
